<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Eye](/Feats.aspx?ID=3092) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Automaton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=398" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 40</row>

**Prerequisites**
[low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416)

</column>

---

Your eye has been magically enhanced to pierce darkness. You gain [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415).

**Enhancement** Your eye can see [invisible](/Conditions.aspx?ID=26) creatures in brief spurts. You can cast [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271) as an arcane innate spell once per hour.
name: Arcane Eye
